biotools.summary: A multiple protein structure alignment server which creates an all-to-all pairwise alignment using a combinatorial extension program and then using Monte Carlo optimization methods conducts an iterative global optimization.  Results are formatted using JOY.

bioschemas.name: CE-MC
bioschemas.summary: A multiple protein structure alignment server which creates an all-to-all pairwise alignment using a combinatorial extension program and then using Monte Carlo optimization methods conducts an iterative global optimization.  Results are formatted using JOY.
